# Security Policy

## Purpose

This repository hosts **published security advisories**. Some advisories may include proof-of-concept code or screenshots to support the technical writeup. Any such material is provided for educational and informational purposes only and should be used solely in authorized testing or remediation efforts.

## Reporting a Security Issue

If you believe you have found a security issue in one of the products referenced in this repository, please report it directly to the affected vendor. This repository is maintained independently and is not affiliated with any of the vendors listed.

If you have found an issue with the repository itself (e.g. accidental inclusion of sensitive data), please open a private security advisory via GitHub or contact the repository owner directly.

## Responsible Disclosure

All advisories in this repository were reported to the affected vendor prior to public disclosure.
